homeHero.title: Microscopic first load, big capability
homeHero.description: Qwik City SSR keeps the shell light. Navigation is enhanced with View Transitions and Speculation Rules when the browser supports them, and third-party scripts stay off the main thread.
homeHero.bulletImmutableHome: - Ultra-thin home route with immutable caching
homeHero.bulletLazyFeatures: - Lazy feature routes for store, chat, and AI
homeHero.latencyServer: Server render: sub-50ms target with streaming enabled
homeHero.latencyCss: Critical CSS: UnoCSS + Lightning CSS keeps payloads tiny
homeHero.latencySpeculation: Speculative nav: prerender all internal links
